entity.description: This bean represents a Prod Demographic.

query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM COURTPLAINTIFF p WHERE p.actionNO = ?1 AND p.plaintiff1Nat IS NOT NULL
SELECT OBJECT(m) FROM MAILONLINEALERT m WHERE m.cbuid = ?1 AND m.groupAiId = ?2 AND m.alertType = ?3
SELECT OBJECT(m) FROM MAILONLINEALERT m WHERE m.uId = ?1 AND m.alertType = ?2 AND m.disabled = ?3
SELECT OBJECT(m) FROM MASTERDUNSTABLE m WHERE m.hkbrc = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(m) FROM MASTERDUNSTABLE m WHERE m.hkci = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(m) FROM MASTERDUNSTABLE m WHERE m.otherReg >= ?1 AND (m.otherRegPlace = ?2 OR m.otherRegPlace IS NULL) LIMIT ?3
SELECT OBJECT(m) FROM MASTERDUNSTABLE m WHERE m.otherReg >= ?1 LIMIT ?2
SELECT OBJECT(m) FROM MASTERDUNSTABLE m WHERE m.cbuid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(m) FROM MASTERNAMEENGLISH m WHERE m.englishName >= ?1 ORDER BY m.englishName LIMIT ?2
SELECT OBJECT(m) FROM MASTERNAMELOCAL m WHERE m.localName >= ?1 ORDER BY m.localName LIMIT ?2
SELECT OBJECT(m) FROM MAILBULKPRODUCTDELIVER m WHERE m.bulkProductDeliverId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(m) FROM MAILBULKPRODUCTDELIVER m WHERE m.uId = ?1 AND m.createdDate > ?2
SELECT OBJECT(m) FROM MAILBULKPRODUCTDELIVER m WHERE m.groupId = ?1 AND m.createdDate > ?2
SELECT OBJECT(m) FROM MAILBULKPRODUCTDELIVER m WHERE m.groupAiId = ?1 AND m.createdDate > ?2
SELECT OBJECT(m) FROM MAILBULKPRODUCTDELIVER m WHERE m.createdDate > ?1
SELECT OBJECT(e) FROM EXPENSE e WHERE e.productUsage IN (47, 50, 51) AND e.createdDate > ?1
SELECT OBJECT(e) FROM EXPENSE e WHERE e.groupID = ?1 AND e.productUsage IN (47, 50, 51) AND e.createdDate > ?2
SELECT OBJECT(e) FROM EXPENSE e WHERE e.groupAIID = ?1 AND e.productUsage IN (47, 50, 51) AND e.createdDate > ?2
SELECT OBJECT(e) FROM EXPENSE e WHERE e.CBUID = ?1 AND e.groupAIID = ?2 AND e.productUsage = ?3 AND e.createdDate > ?4 LIMIT ?5
SELECT OBJECT(e) FROM EXPENSE e WHERE e.expenseID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM USER u WHERE u.deleted = FALSE AND u.userID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM USER u WHERE u.deleted = FALSE AND u.userID = ?1 AND u.password = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM USER u WHERE u.deleted = FALSE
SELECT OBJECT(g) FROM GROUP g WHERE g.deleted = FALSE AND g.AICode = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(g) FROM GROUP g WHERE g.deleted = FALSE
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM ROLE r WHERE r.roleLabel = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM SESSION s WHERE s.uID = ?1 AND s.loginFlag = 1 AND s.logoutDate IS NULL

session.description: To describe that the caller module can process or not

resource-ref.description: DataSource for the DBHK Load Database
DataSource for the DBHK Load Database
